text: Casting Crowns is a Grammy Award winning Christian rock band. Casting Crowns was started in 1999 by a pastor named Mark Hall in Downtown Daytona Beach, Florida as part of a youth group. Later, they moved to Georgia and more members joined, creating the band that is now known as Casting Crowns. Some members of the band currently work as ministers for Eagles Landing First Baptist Church. ==References== Category:Grammy Award winners Category:Christian rock bands Category:Musical groups from Florida Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:Musical groups established in 1999 Category:1990s establishments in Florida
title: Casting Crowns
